com.ziluck.factions.economy

Interface Economy


  • public interface Economy
    An economy hook in for Factions to use.
    Author:
    Michael Ziluck

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean create(UUID uuid)
      Creates a new account for the given user.
      double deposit(UUID uuid, double amount)
      Deposit money into the given User's account.
      boolean exists(UUID uuid)
      Checks if there is an account connected to the UUID of the given User.
      double getBalance(UUID uuid)
      Gets the balance of the given User.
      double withdraw(UUID uuid, double amount)
      Withdraw money from the given User's account.

    • Method Detail

      • getBalance

        double getBalance(UUID uuid)
        Gets the balance of the given User.
        Parameters:
        uuid - the UUID of the User.
        Returns:
        the balance of the User.

      • deposit

        double deposit(UUID uuid,
               double amount)
        Deposit money into the given User's account.
        Parameters:
        uuid - the UUID of the User.
        amount - the amount to deposit.
        Returns:
        the new balance.

      • withdraw

        double withdraw(UUID uuid,
                double amount)
        Withdraw money from the given User's account.
        Parameters:
        uuid - the UUID of the User.
        amount - the amount to withdraw.
        Returns:
        the new balance.

      • exists

        boolean exists(UUID uuid)
        Checks if there is an account connected to the UUID of the given User.
        Parameters:
        uuid - the UUID of the User to check.
        Returns:
        true if the User has an account.

      • create

        boolean create(UUID uuid)
        Creates a new account for the given user. Will return whether or not the attempt to create a new account was successful or not. If the User already had a account, this will still return false.
        Parameters:
        uuid - the UUID of the User to create.
        Returns:
        true if the account was successfully created.
